thread.title: ECB to end QE when inflation on sustainable path: Draghi

title: ECB to end QE when inflation on sustainable path: Draghi
text:
ECB to end QE when inflation on sustainable path: Draghi 10:29pm IST - 01:47 
The ECB has tempered market expectations for a speedy exit from asset buys. As David Pollard reports, ECB President Mario Draghi says further evidence that inflation is rising towards the bank's target is needed first.   
The ECB has tempered market expectations for a speedy exit from asset buys. As David Pollard reports, ECB President Mario Draghi says further evidence that inflation is rising towards the bank's target is needed first.  //reut.rs/2IsD5c3
